display.title: egnopS
description: &&3Squeeze Trees&&r are found in &&2Deep Ocean&&r biomes and are a source of &&3Sponge&&r, &&3Squeeze Leaves&&r, and &&3Delicace&&r.
&&3Squeeze Leaves&&r can be waterlogged and then squeezed repeatedly using &&7[&&r&&6Right-Click&&r&&7]&&r to &&dflood an area with water&&r.
&&3Delicace&&r can be consumed to &&dimprove food and potion effects&&r for some time.
It can also be used to craft a &&dconveyor-like resin&&r, and tiny &&dConstruction Brickss&&r used to make &&dcustom sculptures&&r that can then be sealed using &&3liquid void&&r.
